title: CommonWireframe
description: Schema of common properties for Wireframe events type.

id.description: Defines the unique ID of the wireframe. This should be persistent throughout the view lifetime.

x.description: The position on X axis of the UI element in absolute coordinates.

y.description: The position on Y axis of the UI element in absolute coordinates.

width.description: The width in pixels of the UI element normalised based on the device DPI.

height.description: The height in pixels of the UI element normalised based on the device DPI.
